getF() - Method in class LDtk.TileInstance
"Flip bits", a 2-bits integer to represent the mirror transformations of the tile.
- Bit 0 = X flip
- Bit 1 = Y flip
Examples: f=0 (no flip), f=1 (X flip only), f=2 (Y flip only), f=3 (both flips)

getNineSliceBorders() - Method in class LDtk.EntityDefinition
An array of 4 dimensions for the up/right/down/left borders (in this order) when using 9-slice mode for `tileRenderMode`.
If the tileRenderMode is not NineSlice, then this array is empty.
See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9-slice_scaling
